content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    episodes.filepath() as FileName,
    SUBSTRING(
        episodes.filepath(),
        CHARINDEX('title_ratings-', episodes.filepath()),
        CHARINDEX('.', episodes.filepath())
    ),
    COUNT(*) as counts
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stdimentoringdatalakecm.dfs.core.windows.net/data/silver/imdb/title_ratings/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS episodes
group by episodes.filepath()
ORDER BY SUBSTRING(
        episodes.filepath(),
        CHARINDEX('title_ratings-', episodes.filepath()),
        CHARINDEX('.', episodes.filepath())
    )
